content:
In the afternoon of March 18, the enemy struck the civilian infrastructure of Konotop and settlements of Sumy district.

About thisinformsSumy Regional Military Administration on Telegram.

“Previously, there are no dead. Konotop has damaged communal objects, ”the message reads.

Currently, the consequences of the attack of the aggressor state are being clarified. All the necessary services work in place.

As reported by the Armyinform, on the Great Pisarivka in the Sumy region Russian aviation over the past dayremoved9 Fugas Aviation Bombs and 14 managed aviation.
title: In Konotop due to the shelling of the Russian Federation damaged the objects of communal sphere
description: It is reported by the Sumy Regional Military Administration on Telegram. "Previously,...
author: Army Inform
